title: OpenStreetMap: Africa & Earth
description:
19 levels of zoom (~1 m details) for Africa, illustrating human geography.

10 levels of zoom (~1 km details) for satellite photos, covering the whole world.
extra_description: Search for cities/towns with more than 1000 people.
footnote: Size: 11G, Zoom levels: 14 (overzoom to level 18+), Searchable cities/towns: 127,654, Date: August 2017
